text.div:
Cryptosporidiosis (Tests for Cryptosporidium species Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    21233-2 Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool
    31793-3 Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Units/volume] in Stool
    31794-1 Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    39534-3 Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool by Immunofluorescence
    41487-0 Cryptosporidium parvum Ag [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
    48059-0 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
    48060-8 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool
    48061-6 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool by Immunofluorescence
    48062-4 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium parvum Ag [Presence] in Stool by Immunofluorescence
    48063-2 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium parvum Ag [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
    48064-0 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium parvum Ag [Presence] in Stool
    49232-2 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool by Rapid, less than 30 minutes
    49233-0 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium parvum Ag [Presence] in Stool by Rapid, less than 30 minutes
    51911-6 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool --3rd specimen
    51912-4 Giardia lamblia+Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool --2nd specimen
    566-0 Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    63564-9 Giardia lamblia Ag and Cryptosporidium parvum Ag and Entamoeba histolytica/dispar Ag [Identifier] in Stool
    6371-9 Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
    6372-7 Cryptosporidium sp Ag [Titer] in Stool by Immunofluorescence
    91677-5 Cryptosporidium parvum Ag [Presence] in Stool by Rapid immunoassay
